mazhar abbas said that 50 of tv channels and newspapers of pakistan are exploiting media workers journalists are working there without any formal agreement

a3ohqrf1mdq99b
According to the Pakistan Mazhar Abbas, 85 percent of workers at newspapers and TV channels are being exploited, without no contract at the place where they are working.
